title: Elves and Escapades
description: In some disgrace after the events of the preceding term, Charley is determined to redeem herself, and resolve her complicated love life. The Christmas holidays change her life forever, but before she finds her feet again, she and her friends are drawn into dark, old magic. A magical YA school story with a sapphic twist, the second in the Scholars and Sorcery series.
author: Eleanor Beresford
